about_the_game:
This OST includes song by the unavoidable artist for Triangle Service shooting games naoto, but also great guests like Go Sato from the Raiden games and WASi303 from the Psyvariar games! A great soundtrack ideal for different shooting styles.

Shmups skill test Original Soundtrack:

01 Select naoto
02 Shmups skill test #1 naoto
03 Shmups skill test #2 naoto
04 Shmups skill test 30sec naoto
05 Nice bomb! Shoichi Koike
06 TANK RUSH! Go Sato
07 8bit buzzer WASi303
08 8bit start WASi303
09 8bit WASi303
10 8bit clear WASi303
11 8bit result WASi303
12 The Skater's Waltz
13 Result naoto
14 GameOver naoto

Special Tracks:
15 miku vader WASi303
16 16bit 200X Ver WASi303
17 Tank Rush! Arrange Ver Go Sato
18 8bit -Filtering Love mix- Wiz.(FMPSG)
19 Shmups skill test 8bit -BLUE SCRATCH mix- WASi303
20 Shmups skill test #1 -Crazy Choir Remix- naoto

short_description: Ideal soundtrack for all shooters! Including tracks by naoto, but also great guest artists like Go Sato and WASi303.
